channel.title: Pest Control Problems
channel.description:
Well, instead of trying to code out the actual glitchy pest control game, I decided to make PC a training area.
I got a few questions on how to make this actually ... good.
[b]How can I make Portals NOT attack me, and give them 200 hp?[/b]
[img]http://i30.tinypic.com/m8g0n5.jpg[/img]
[b]How can I make the other monsters move around, but only in the PC area, outside the fence?[/b] [b]How can I change what the monsters hit? I have some high and low levels, but all autospawn'd monsters hit up to 30, and that's plain annoying.[/b][br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2009, 09:45:58 am[/size][hr]*Notices that people don't reply to PC Problems.. :s*

item.title: Pest Control Problems
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Well, instead of trying to code out the actual glitchy pest control game, I decided to make PC a training area.

I got a few questions on how to make this actually … good.

How can I make Portals NOT attack me, and give them 200 hp?

m8g0n5.jpg768×548

How can I make the other monsters move around, but only in the PC area, outside the fence?
How can I change what the monsters hit? I have some high and low levels, but all autospawn’d monsters hit up to 30, and that’s plain annoying.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2009, 09:45:58 am[/size][hr]Notices that people don’t reply to PC Problems… :s
